sections.description: Ask questions in everyday language and AI Pencil generates interactive dashboards, explains root-cause anomalies, and projects performance into the future so you can decide faster with confidence in the numbers.

features.title: Visual Builder, Zero Code
features.description: Design processes visually with drag-and-drop nodes, set rules in plain language, and watch the canvas compile into RPA and n8n pipelines that deploy, version, and roll back with a click.

features.title: Predictive Auto-Scaling
features.description: AI predicts workload spikes and scales resources in advance, ensuring smooth performance and lower costs—even during high-traffic periods like product launches, promotions, or seasonal peaks.

sections.description: With over 700 ready-made nodes and thousands of community templates, n8n lets you drag-drop apps, APIs, and AI models into event-driven workflows that deploy on-prem or cloud in minutes.

features.title: 800+ Pre-built Nodes
features.description: Choose from hundreds of official and community nodes covering CRM, DevOps, finance, and AI; if an app is missing, add an HTTP Request or custom JavaScript node to extend instantly.

features.title: Template Library & One-Click Import
features.description: Grab a starter from the 600-plus template library, plug in credentials, and hit "Execute" n8n imports variables, schedules triggers, and logs versions so teams iterate safely without reinventing workflows.

sections.description: Unify marketing, sales, and support on one AI-driven workspace that scores leads, personalizes messages, and turns delighted customers into brand advocates who amplify growth without additional ad spend or effort.

features.title: AI Lead Scoring & Routing
features.description: Predictive lead scoring analyzes engagement, firmographics, and intent signals, assigning priority ranks automatically and routing hot opportunities to the right rep before competitors even reply to the initial inquiry quickly.

features.title: Dynamic Offer Optimization
features.description: AI analyses customer behaviour in real time, automatically tests price points and promos, then pushes the highest-converting offer to each segment, maximising revenue while preventing discount cannibalisation across channels.

cards.title: Secure Self-Hosting
cards.description: Deploy n8n in your own VPC or on-prem box with GDPR-ready encryption, granular credential vaults, and isolation options, ensuring sensitive business data never leaves your control while meeting compliance rules.

cards.title: Ready to Answer
cards.description: An AI-powered knowledge hub ingests policies, tickets, and manuals, updates itself with every new support interaction, and serves context-aware answers for each role—eliminating manual upkeep and shortening resolution times.
